@graph.name: Easy Chicken Stir Fry Recipe - Mom On Timeout
@graph.description: This easy Chicken Stir Fry recipe is loaded with fresh veggies and the most delicious sauce made with honey, soy sauce, and toasted sesame oil!

@graph.name: Trish - Mom On Timeout
@graph.description: Hi there! I'm Trish - the resident "Mom On Timeout". I am a very blessed stay-at-home mommy to two darling little boys ages 6 and 4. I love sharing my favorite recipes, DIY projects, and fun crafts for the kiddos with my readers. I hope you'll enjoy taking a timeout with me :)

@graph.name: Chicken Stir Fry Recipe
@graph.description: This easy Chicken Stir Fry recipe is loaded with fresh veggies and the most delicious sauce made with honey, soy sauce, and toasted sesame oil! This healthy recipe takes 20 minutes to make and will wow your family with it's amazing flavor!
recipeIngredient: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast (cut into 1 inch cubes)
1/2  yellow bell pepper (cut into 1 inch pieces)
1/2  red bell pepper (cut into 1 inch pieces)

itemListElement.text: In a medium size bowl, whisk together corn starch and water. Add remaining ingredients (chicken broth, soy sauce, honey, and toasted sesame oil, red pepper flakes) and whisk to combine. Set aside.
itemListElement.name: In a medium size bowl, whisk together corn starch and water. Add remaining ingredients (chicken broth, soy sauce, honey, and toasted sesame oil, red pepper flakes) and whisk to combine. Set aside.

itemListElement.text: Add one tablespoon of olive oil to a large skillet or wok and heat over medium high heat.
itemListElement.name: Add one tablespoon of olive oil to a large skillet or wok and heat over medium high heat.

itemListElement.text: Add chicken (in batches if necessary) and season with salt and pepper. Cook for 3 to 5 minutes or until cooked through. Remove from skillet.
itemListElement.name: Add chicken (in batches if necessary) and season with salt and pepper. Cook for 3 to 5 minutes or until cooked through. Remove from skillet.

itemListElement.text: Reduce heat to medium and add remaining tablespoon of oil to the skillet.
itemListElement.name: Reduce heat to medium and add remaining tablespoon of oil to the skillet.

itemListElement.text: Add broccoli, bell pepper, and carrots and cook, stirring occasionally, just until crisp tender. Add ginger and garlic and cook for an additional minute.
itemListElement.name: Add broccoli, bell pepper, and carrots and cook, stirring occasionally, just until crisp tender. Add ginger and garlic and cook for an additional minute.

itemListElement.text: Add chicken back into the skillet and stir to combine.
itemListElement.name: Add chicken back into the skillet and stir to combine.

itemListElement.text: Whisk stir fry sauce and pour over chicken and vegetables and stir gently to combine.
itemListElement.name: Whisk stir fry sauce and pour over chicken and vegetables and stir gently to combine.

itemListElement.text: Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally, and let boil for one minute.
itemListElement.name: Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally, and let boil for one minute.

itemListElement.text: Serve with rice and/or chow mein if desired.
itemListElement.name: Serve with rice and/or chow mein if desired.
